sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-login", templateUrl: "login.component.html" }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { focus; focus1; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]; body.classList.add("login-page"); } ngOnDestroy() { var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]; body.classList.remove("login-page"); } }
